attributes.action: UK Government should provide military assistance to Israel
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the rise of fundamentalist groups in the Middle east and the growing threat to democracy from militant groups such as ISIS and Hamas the UK government should provide financial and military support to Israel.

Israel is carrying the fight to terrorist organisations who would threaten the whole of Western Civilisation and under whose protection terrorist training camps are allowed to flourish.

These groups must be stopped and foreign aid should be diverted to support Israeli military action.
